titleStmt.title: Hypocrisie discovered in its nature and workings. Delivered in several sermons, by that faithfull minister of the Gospell, Mr Cuthbert Sidenham, late teacher to a Church of Christ in Newcastle upon Tyne.
titleStmt.author: Sydenham, Cuthbert, 1622-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.H. for Rich. Tomlins, at the Sun and Bible in Pye-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
